item.description: I missed Freshlyground when they performed at the MFA last summer. lets go and see them. They are "A South African Afro-fusion band, Freshlyground came together in Cape Town in 2002. Led by singer Zolani Mahola, and featuring Simon Attwell on flute, mbira and harmonica, Peter Cohen on drums, Kyla Rose Smith on violin, Julio “Gugs” Sigauque on acoustic guitar, Josh Hawks on bass guitar and Seredeal “Shaggy” Scheepers on keyboards and percussion, Freshlyground blended traditional kwela and African folk with jazz, blues and an indie rock sensibility into a distinctive and refreshing style and sound. The group released a debut album, Jika Jika, in 2003, following it with Nomvula in 2004, Ma’ Cheri in 2007, and Radio Africa in 2010. ~ Steve Leggett, Rovi
item.how_to_find_us: Details to be posted near event day. Get your tickets at either ticketmaster/Livenation or at Paradise before concert day as I'm not sure if it will be sold out.
item.name: Freshlyground at Paradise Rock Club
